title: Chemtrade Logistics Income Fund Declares October 2019 Distribution
text:
TORONTO — Chemtrade Logistics Income Fund (TSX: CHE.UN) today announced that it has declared a cash distribution of $0.10 per unit for the month of October 2019 payable on November 29, 2019 to unitholders of record at the close of business on October 31, 2019.

Holders of units who are non-residents of Canada will be required to pay all withholding taxes payable in respect of any distributions of income by the Fund.

View source version on businesswire.com: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20191022005261/en/
